111.content: What kind of tickle is Reese going to give?
111.title: Reese

choices: tickle another part of Francis' body.
1111.content:
Francis woke up and attempted to rub the sleep out of his eyes, only to find his arms would not obey him. Looking over he noticed his hands tied to the headboard. The next thing he saw was Reece smiling down at him from the foot of the bed; where his feet were also tied.

"Finally you are awake," Reece said with a grin. "I was beginning to think you would never come about.

"What is this?" Francis asked as he pulled at the wrist restraints. "Why did you tie me down?"

"Well," Reece started as he double checked the restraints. "You have made it your mission to torture the living out of everything alive since you were born. I have had just about enough and thought I might teach you a lesson." Reece went to look out the window to ensure no one was coming. Malcolm was over at Stevie's and everyone else was at grandma Ida's. He should have plenty of time.

"Lesson? In what, knot tying," Francis said with a laugh. "I have to admit, these are good. Almost as good as that time I hogtied y..." Francis suddenly stopped, somewhat coming to terms of what might happen. He hoped Reece had forgotten; he had not.

"Go on," Reece calmly spoke as he turned around to lean against the wall. "Maybe you forgot, but I HAVEN'T!" Reece puncuated the sentence by quickly slamming his hands down on the foot of the bed. "You mean the time you hogtied me and you and Malcolm tickled me for hours, three to be exact. You even kept going after I peed myself. One nonstop on my feet, one on my upperbody, then one everywhere. Sure you gave breaks but it was torture! I got Malcolm back two weeks ago, and oh was it sweet. I have never heard him beg so much, and now its your turn. Tartarus will look like a walk on the yellow brick road when I am finished with you.

"Come on Reece," Francis began to plead with fear as Reece extended a finger toward each of his black socked feet and turned his mouth into a devilish smile. Francis knew he was horribly ticklish and there was no way he would be able to take this. "Let me loose and we can both capture Malcolm; it would be awesome payback.

"No, I am good. It is a good thing you sleep in just boxers; clothes would just get in the way.

At that Reese started to...
1111.title: Revenge tickle torture

11111.content:
Reece began to lightly tickle both of his brothers feet with his index fingers. Slowly tracing the sole from top to bottom. Francis tried to fight it but giggles were starting to slip through.

"Come on tough bro," Reece taunted. "I know you are ticklish and the sooner you laugh, the sooner it ends." Reece was lying, the more his blonde brother laughed, the more he would tickle. He continued to tickle the feet lightly but sped up a little and added in his middle finger.

Francis continued to try to hold back giggles, but it was useless. Once Reece added the second finger he was now letting out a steady stream. "Hehehehe steheheheop ihihihit." he pleaded. He knew it would only get worse and was genuinely afraid. He did manage to knock Reese's fingers away a few times, but they found their way right back to the ticklish feet.

Reese decided to kick it up a notch and use all of his fingers; dragging his nails rapidly up and down but still pressing lightly.

"Hahahahaha nohohohohho dhahahahahaont. Francis hated how ticklish he was. Reese hadn't even really started tickling and already he was laughing out loud. "Hahahahaha pleheheheheheheehease."

Reese suddenly stopped after about two minutes of tickling and cracked his kuckles. "alright, now time for the real tickling. From the results of the light tickling, you are in for a nightmare. "Should I stay here or move up your body?"

"Come on, I swear I will help you get Malcolm, just let me out of here.

"I asked you a question; here or somewhere else?

"Please Reece, just do-."

"Since you don't want to cooperate, I will choose myself."

Tapping his chin with his finger, Reese thought about what to do. He decided to...
11111.title: lightly tickle Francis' feet.

111112.content: Where will Reece tickle next?
111112.title: move on to somewhere else.

1111121.content:
Reece left the foot of the bed and walked up towards Francis' underarms, that were surprisingly hairless.

"You shave your pits?" Reece asked with a surprised expression.

"You better not tell anyone, or I'll kill you," Francis spat back.

"You aren't in any position to make threats are you?"

"UGH! Just let me ouahahahammmm." Francis tried to stifle his laugh as Reece started to draw circles around his underarms.

"Remember how you would hold us down and tickle us like this? Payback is the best isn't it?" Reece smiled as he sped up with drawing the circles. Over and over again. "You're not ticklish here are you? It would suck if you were; since I plan on tickling the crap out of these pits.

Then it began. Reece's fingers spidered all over Francis' underarms. Them being hairless didnt help. It gave Reece access to every millimetre of skin. He did save one spot though, the very centre. The spot that made him howl with endless laughter, and soon, Francis would too.

"Stahahahahahaha hahahahaha nahhohohohhahaha plhahahahaha." Francis' words were lost in his laughter. No matter which way he moved, or how hard he pulled, he could not protect himself from Reece's onslaught. "HahahahahHHAHAHAHAHAHA S HAHAHA S HAHA STOP!" Francis managed to yell as Reece started to dig into the spot right beneath the underarms, and used his nails to scritch scratch at the rest. It seemed like hours before Reece finally stopped.

"Go ahead," Reece said with a smile. "Catch your breath; you'll need it."

"Okay *gasp* you got *gasp* your revenge," Francis managed to get out between breaths.

"Haha, you sound like Stevie. Ready for round two?"

Right before Francis was about to say no, Reece started on his underarms again. Now focusing all of his attention into the dead center of them. Light touch, heavy touch,all fingers, one finger, every technique out there. Sometimes Francis would get quite, but it was only because he had gone into silent laughter. This caused Reece to slow down for a little bit; it's no fun without laughter.

"HAAHAHAHAHA SHAHAHAHAAHAAHARRY HAHAHAHAHAHA PLEHEHEHEASE HAHAHAHAHAH." Francis was going crazy. Sure he would torture his brothers like this when they were younger, but that's what older brothers do. Laying there now, getting the life tickled out of him was not something he fancied very much. Laughing was the only thing he could, and laugh he did. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHA NHOHOHOHOHHOHOHOO MAHAHAHAHAORE HAHAHAHAHAHA STHAHAHAHAHAHAAP!"

Reece caught glimpse of the time and was shocked it had already been fifteen minutes of tickling his brother. Slowly stopping, he decided to give him a break. "Okay, I will give you a choice again. I am going to finish tickling up here, but should I keep using my fingers, or something else?" Fifteen minutes of laughter did not make it very easy for Francis to speak, which was not good for an impatient Reece. "Too late, I'll just...
1111121.title: Underarms.

11111211.content:
Reece had never been on such a power trip. His brothers armpits were extremely ticklish and the lack of hair made it easier to tickle, and was oddly cute in Reece's opinion. If Reece was honest, tickling Malcom had been a treat but getting back at his older brother was every bit as exhilarating as he had dreamed about for many years. Now he had trapped said brother and had the ability to do whatever he wanted, and what he wanted was to make Francis suffer everything he had put Reece through.

And suffer Francis was if what Reece was hearing was any indication, "HEHEHehaHEHAheHARhaHEhahHEhehaHEHAhaheha" The centers of Francis armpits were massively sensitive and this was exacerbated by the slight sweat that he had worked up which allowed for Reece's finger to glide easily over the skin. As much fun as Reece was having, he had learned from his own experience being tickled that it was important to change targets and he also had told Francis he would finish up on the armpits and so he was left to make the very important decision of where next:

Back to the large, soft feet that had only gotten a light teasing compared to what Reece had planned or

to his brother's impressive chest and flat stomach?
11111211.title: keep using fingers."

11111212.content:
"..Use this ELECTIC toothbrush," Racce said suddenly pulling a green electronic toothbrush out of his pocket and putting at the center of his brother’s hairless right pit “HAHAHAHAHPLEASHAHAHAHNOHAHHAHAHA” Francis begged felling the evil instrument brushed all around his sensitive skin making him laugh and jump around his binds trying to escape but there is no escape only laughter “PLEASHHHAHAHAHASTOOOHHHAHAHAP” Francis was all but sobbing at this moment with tears running through his eyes and soft layer sweat was starting to cover his body.

“now we can continue without interruptions,” the brunet said and started to use both the brush and the back scratcher at his brother’s defenses, ticklish pits scratching brushing all over the hollows sending the older boy into a ticklish despair “MPHPHMHPHMHPMHHPMHHAHAHMPHMPHMHAMPH” he scrammed into the gag he could not believe how much this tickled, he didn’t even know he was this ticklish before this and know he was completely and the mercy of his younger brother who seemed to be keen on making him regret even think of tickling him and boy he did! “MPHHAHAH” the teen screamed when the toothbrush started wreaking where the breast and the pit met sending his into another tickling frenzy while that evil scratcher kept tickling the other pit at a steady rhythm, Francis was going crazy “MPHMPHMHAMAPMHPMHAPMAHPANHPMASHPMAHMPAPMAHPMAAMPHMPAMH”.
After what seemed to him like hours to him (it was on 45 minutes ) the torture stops and Recce removes the gag and lets his older brother catch his breath “Pleas, bro, I can’t take anymore tickling I GONNA DIE?” and the younger boy really thought about looking at the state of his brother his whole body was covered with sweat his tear-filled eyes begged with him to let him go and his hairless pits had red marks from all the tickling he forced him through but he decided against it “Nah bro you tickled till I passed out know am retiring the favor” he said menacingly. Francis fracked out “NOT MY PITS AGAIN PLEASE I CAN'T TAKE IT” the blonde teen pleaded and his little brother only laughed “ok ok I am done with this smooth pities of your I have other spots to explore also but I promise, I will not touch them again” and Francis sighed in relief he did not think he could take it any longer his pits seemed to be the most ticklish part of his body but know he had to bear whatever else twisted torture his brother had in store for him.

Where Francis is tickled next?

112.content: what Kind of tickle Malcolm gives

1121.content:
Malcolm Wilkerson was not having a good day and the reason was his older brother Francis, that brat was so annoying! How he wished to do something to get him back for this prank he just pulled but he was older and stronger than him what is he going to do?
Suddenly he heard a knock at his door and his older brother Recce was inside his room "hey little bro what up?" the older teen said, "Francis pulled another prank on me!" Malcolm answer to his brother "ah that's why you're like this" "yeah he just so annoying I wish I could do something to get him back" the brunette said. The older teen smiled and said "what if I told you can" "how? Francis is older and stronger than me how can I get him back?" "what if I told you that our brother has a weakness that makes him scream like a little boy? "what?" "he's ticklish".
Malcolm raised an eyebrow in surprise "NO way! You're kidding me, right?" the older brunette shook his head and said "Nope is true time we were wrestling, he tried to pull into a full nelson I brushed my fingers at his sides, and he lost it! I tell you he is one of the most ticklish people I know"
Malcolm thought about it finally something that he could use to teach that brat a lesson! But how in the world could he do that he was still stronger than him? The older teen seemed to see where his brother was going with his thoughts "don't worry about that I have an idea: mum and dad are going out next weekend so we will put some slapping pills into one the stuff Francis likes to drink and when he is asleep we tie him up and you can have your revenge" the second Wilkerson boy said "you don't want to tickle him too" he asked "Nah I just watch some tv" "ok let's do it".
The weekend arrived and the two teens put in motion their plan as soon as their parents leave the house putting the pill at their older brother's drink and let it take effect and when they heard the blonde's soft snores they knew it was time to act. First, they carried him to Malcolm's bed and removed his shirt exposing his lean and hairless upper body then they removed his shoes exposing his bare feet tying them together at the end the took his arms and raised them above his head, his pits like the rest of his body was hairless "he must shave" Recce said after they make sure their victim could not pull his arms down and his legs where secured Recce said "have fun" and so the younger brother is now alone with his older brother waiting for him to wake up
"uhh what's going on?" the older of the Wilkerson teens asked as he woke bleary-eyed only when he went to rub his eyes and found them stuck he fully awoke and saw his little brother standing in front of him "Hey! what happened here untie me!" The black-haired boy smirked and said, "No way big bro this is payback for all the pranks you pulled to me" with that the younger brother started to run his fingers through the trapped soles of his victim "hahahahwhaaahahat?tiihhhhcklinghahahahahahahhahahahhaha?" the blond asked in surprise he knew he was incredibly ticklish; his father used to tickle him before the rest of his brothers were born and from his current reaction he doubted his sensitivity has decreased over the years not the eighteen year old thought, it seemed he was as ticklish as ever and at the mercy of a very pissed off brother.
said brother had the time of his life as he had his way with the bare feet before him, Francis's feet were smooth and soft, it looks like Francis never walked barefoot on his life!. Malcolm was moving up and down the feet with surprising speed covering the ground from the top to the heels many times falling to draw new giggles from his victim "hahahahhahahahaahhaha" the blond never stop laughing since the ordeal began and was already red in the face, not wanting him to pass out already the brunette gave his brother a break "Ok Mal you had your fun now untie me!" Francis demanded but Malcolm smirked "you think this is it?! No Francis by the time am done with you you'll never think of pranking me again" then his began to use his hands on the toes stroking between them making his brother struggle at his bonds "hahehaehahehahahahahehehanothahahahahahahahahhahtheeehehehehehehhehehetoeee hehehehhehehshshshahahahhahahahahahahahhahahahaha".
after giving his red faced brother another short break the middle Wilkerson decided to move up to Franci's slender thighs which proved to be a gold mine of ticklishness as the genius dig to the meat of them "HAHAAHEHEANOHAHAHHAHEHAHEHAHEHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHHASTOOOHOHOH OHOHOHOHOHP" the fair haired Wilkerson swore internally 'dam it is there any place in my body is not ticklish?" he thought as a copious amount of laughter was forced out of him "HAHAHHAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" Malcolm thanked his luck, for his brother did not wear any pants today and so his underwear did not provide any kind of protection from the mean fingers abusing his tender flesh without mercy.
"HAHAHHAAHHAHAHHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHSTOHOHOHOHOHHOPHHHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHA HEHAHHEHE" the blond was screaming as his brother put his fingers under his bare upper thighs and gouache them into the ticklish skin sending electric waves through Francis whole body making him squirm and thrash at his bound trying in vain to escape from the torture his younger brother was inflicting at him "HAAHAHDAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHASHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAH" Malcolm would be lying if he said he did not enjoy this he wanted to do something to make Francis suffer from the countless upon countless pranks and now he found it! and suffering Francis was if that loud laughter of his was any indication "HAHAHAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHSTOOHHOHOHOHOHHPAPAAPAPAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAAHAH HAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAMAAAAALCOHOHOHOHOMHAHHAHAMRECYYYYYYYYYYYYY".
when the thigs were having so many red marks in them you could though Francis was attacked by a bunch of cats his brother stopped his brutal assault and gave him another break " 'gasp' thank 'gasp' you 'gasp' the blond said short of breath "don't thank me yet we still have a lot of fun to do together" his younger brother said and took a look at his brother's toned upper body wondering were to tickle next. ultimately he decided to stick to his them of climbing up his brother's body and poked the hip bones drawing yet another fit of giggles from his bound victim "heehehhaehahehahahhehehehaheheahahaehahehaheahahheahheahehahheheaahahah" ; the blond let out light giggles at that it seemed his earlier assumption of not having a non-ticklish part on his body was correct. thankfully he did not have the same level of ticklishness at all his part, that could be true torture!
Malcolm grew tired of only poking the hips and so put his thumbs at them and gives them a 'tickling massage' by rubbing them all around the sensitive area "hahehahehahehhehahehehehehhestoooohohhohohoohohpphphpphphhahahahahahahhahah apleashahahhehahahahahahhahahahahhahahahahahahahhstooopahahhahahhahahahahaha" ; the blond begged, unfortunately for him, Malcolm did not stop, on the contrary, he used his free fingers to tickle his blond brother's lower stomach "HAHAHANAHAHAHANANHAHHAHAHSHSHHSHSHSHSHSHSHSHHSHSHSHSHSHHSHSHSHHSHAHAHAHAHAH AHAHAHAHAHHAHAHHAHA" the slightly muscled belly proved to be an excellent target and the chestnut haired teen moved all his finger there spidering him all over sending the older teen into a ticklish frenzy "HAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHANAHAHAHAHSTAAAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHHHAHAHAPHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHA HAHAHAHANOHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAH" While Malcolm was tickling the hypersensitive tummy he took notice of his older brother's shallow belly button looking positively ticklish and ready for the taking.
Not once stopping the fingers on the stomach Malcolm lowered his head at the innie and procced to give Francis the biggest raspberry of his life "AHAHHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHANAHAHEAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHHAHASTAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAPLEAHAHA HAHSEHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAAHHASTOHAHAHAHAHAAPHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHA AHHAHHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAH" the fair haired teen went crazy, having two of very ticklish spots at once was maddening and though he would surely pass out, he didn't he just thrashed all over the bed as his little's brother's hands and mouth were destroying his nervous system. after the dark haired boy was satisfied he stopped and gave yet another break to Francis who looked exhausted; a light layer of sweat was covering his body, tears were threating to dop down his eyes and he had trouble breathing " 'gasp' ple- 'gasp' -ase 'gasp' 'gasp' dude I can't take it anymore. am sorry about the pranks just let up I beg you" the blond said as soon as he was able to do so "no your not" the chocolate haired declared "stop your begging is pathetic am not going to stop till I thinking you're sorry enough!".

142.content: Why does Reese tickle Dewey?
142.title: Reese

1421.content:
If there was one thing Reese enjoyed, it was torturing his younger brothers. Mostly he liked to beat them up. Today, though, he would do something different.

Lois and Hal were out and Malcolm was at Stevie's. That left just Reese, Dewey, and Jamie in the house. Jamie was really young, though, so Reese figured he wouldn't get in the way. He had planned to beat up Dewey but then he realized that he might leave a mark for his parents to see. So he decided to think of another way.

As he was walking along, he was swinging his hands and one accidentally brushed Dewey lightly, making him giggle. Reese never knew Dewey was ticklish and decided this would be the perfect torture.

He then grabbed Dewey and dragged him to their bedroom, where he laid him on his bed.

"Wha-what are you doing to me, Reese?" Dewey asked frightened.

"I'm going to tickle you" Reese replied.

Dewey tried to run, but Reese held him down.

How does Reese keep him restrained
1421.title: To torture him

"Perfect" said Reese. "You're just the way I want you."

Then Reese began by tickling Dewey's

info.brief_description: The Wilkerson boys get tickled to their limits :)
info.description: This is a story where you get to decide how Malcolm and his brothers are tickled and by whom. Really no restrictions, but it would be nice if chapters made sense. It would also be cool if it was kept m/m. Other than that anyone please add.
